content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a family court case the court case was filed on december 23rd 2019 and lasted for 2 years the court has confirmed the liquidation statement made by the liquidating notary with some modifications the court has resolved disputes regarding rewards taxation issues and allocation of costs between the parties the courts decision is based on legal principles regarding property ownership and community property rights the court has referred the case back for finalization of the liquidation partition operations the court has recognized the gentlemans right to an award and ruled on the allocation of costs the court has referred the file to the liquidating notary for further action the court has considered the arguments and documents presented by both parties and made its decision based on the facts of the case the court has concluded that the parties were married under the legal community regime and have three children together the court has addressed objections raised by the parties including a joint donation made by the gentlemans mother the court has found that the gift should be considered as common property the court has also addressed the calculation of the reward and the inclusion of ancillary costs the court has made its decision based on applicable legal principles and case law the court discusses the liquidation of a community scheme the calculation of rewards tax refunds management of joint funds burden of proof and allocation of costs the court ultimately awards the husband a specific amount as a reward and orders the reimbursement of the tax refund the court also determines the allocation of costs and orders both parties to pay the incurred costs the judgment is provisionally enforceable
